Question: Aqara LLC CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Aqara LLC

Product 1
- Aqara Border Router Plug
  - Incorporates Thread Border Router capabilities
  - Equipped with Thread and dual-band Wi-Fi
  - Energy-efficient with real-time and historical data on home energy consumption
  - Can sense the on/off status of connected appliances for triggering automations

Product 2
- Aqara Smart Lock U300
  - Matter and Thread compatibility
  - Extended battery life of up to 8 months
  - Offers key-free lifestyle with multiple access options
  - Supports remote control and real-time notifications

Product 3
- Aqara Hub M3
  - Multi-protocol Matter controller with Thread Border Router capabilities
  - Retains Zigbee hub functionality and adds Thread and Bluetooth protocols
  - Offers 2.4GHz/5GHz dual-band Wi-Fi and Power over Ethernet (PoE) connection
  - Supports edge capabilities for local control and automations
